Author: jl777c#5810
Content: tokenconvert destpubkey

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so you send the tokens and change the evalcode in the same operation

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: gatewayspubkey is global across all chains, yes

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Oh, great. So this step ` transfer to gateways pubkey:` by `tokentransfer` from your guide no needed anymore to setup gateway

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you need to tokenconvert it instead of tokentransfer

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: tokenconvert is basically tokentransfer with an evalcode convert added

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the gatewaysclaim automatically does an evalcode convert to assets CC, so after the claim it is freely tradeable asset

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you do need to do a tokenconvert before doing a withdraw as withdraw is a gatewaysCC

Content: withdraw means to send tokens to the withdraw address to get back real coins
